title: Hi I have Issues transferring files from Pixel 3a to my PC.
content: First time I try to transfer files to my laptop. When I switch to data transfer on my phone, I hear the computer make a sound as if it recognizes new material, but I don't see anything: no window appears. The device manager displays a "Google Nexus ADB Interface" on an Android device ... but nothing on File explorer...  Any idea, please?
